t: John Bean — Techno Industrial Machinery Enterprises
s: John Bean is one of the world's leading brands of garage equipment for garages, tire shops, and body repair service. The company's roots date back to a retired inventor, John Bean. After Snap-on acquired the company, John Bean kept to their mission of developing innovative technologies.
